title: Virtual Assistant (Outbound Calls & Customer Service)
job_overview:
We’re seeking a talented and trustworthy individual with proven skills in outbound sales, lead generation, and customer service. If you have a passion for connecting with people, delivering proven results, and offering outstanding customer support, we’d love to hear from you.

Key Responsibilities:
- Conduct outbound calls to potential leads, with a focus on building rapport and creating engagement.
- Handle customer service inquiries with professionalism and empathy, ensuring a positive customer experience.
- Generate and qualify leads through proactive outreach and follow-up strategies.
- Maintain accurate and organized records of interactions and outcomes.
- Collaborate with the team to meet and exceed performance targets.

Qualifications:
- Strong English communication skills, both verbal and written, with minimal accent.
- Proven experience in outbound sales, lead generation, and/or customer service.
- Ability to quickly build trust and maintain positive relationships with customers and leads.
- Excellent problem-solving and interpersonal skills.
- Comfortable working independently in a remote environment.
- Reliable internet connection and appropriate home office setup.

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with CRM tools and outbound call software.
- Ability to handle high call volumes while maintaining attention to detail.
- Familiarity with U.S. markets is a plus.

If you’re a self-motivated, results-driven professional who enjoys connecting with people and providing excellent service, we encourage you to apply.

Please submit your resume along with a short introduction video (1-2 minutes) highlighting your skills, experience, and why you would be a great fit for this role.
